meanings.definition: A person who creates abstract art.
meanings.sent1: The abstractionists used bold colors in their paintings.
meanings.sent2: Many abstractionists prefer to express emotions through their artwork.
meanings.sent3: The abstractionists decided to paint a rainbow without using any actual colors.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an abstractionists' canvas, filled with swirling thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The gallery was filled with the vibrant creations of the abstractionists.

meanings.definition: A group of artists who focus on creating abstract works.
meanings.sent1: In the art community, the abstractionists were known for their innovative techniques.
meanings.sent2: The exhibition featured works by various abstractionists from around the world.
meanings.sent3: At the art studio, the abstractionists joked about painting invisible masterpieces.
meanings.sent4: Their collective imagination soared as the abstractionists collaborated on a new project.
meanings.sent5: The museum showcased the diverse styles of the abstractionists' group.

meanings.definition: The style or movement of creating abstract art.
meanings.sent1: Abstract expressionism is a well-known form of abstractionists.
meanings.sent2: The art history class discussed the evolution of abstractionists over the years.
meanings.sent3: The art critics debated the impact of abstractionists on contemporary art.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were alive with the spirit of abstractionists during the art festival.
meanings.sent5: The museum celebrated the rich history of abstractionists in a special exhibition.
